subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: ghost box hacks

Well, to honest, I trust the C2C staff, seems more like sbtle disinformati=
on to me. 
 
 As far as that Jesus thing, ----no comment.
 Frank-S


To: EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: orbhunterx@...: Sun, 2 Dec 2007 21:07:=
55 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: ghost box hacks




Hey Frank,Have you had m=
uch success in addressing things with C2C folks?I'm a C2C Streamlink member=
 and would love to hear them interview you. I had a lot of misconceptions d=
ue to what some have attributed to you in the past, specifically regarding =
your device being something Jesus personally approved. Don't get me wrong t=
hough. As a Vice President of the board of a Unity church, I consider Jesus=
 to be a friend and way shower. I'm sure glad to see you're a serious resea=
rch engineer. It's painfully obvious that some folks are all about steering=
 these efforts to their own ends by pushing the religous angle.Keep the gre=
at work moving ahead!Lance--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <f=
ranks-boxes@...> wrote:>> > I think you'll find the C2C staff not as intere=
sted as they would like us to believe.> > Frank-S> > > To: EVP-ITC@...: mic=
haelcoletta@...: Sun, 2 Dec 2007 03:04:45 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: ghost=
 box hacks> > > > > I wrote to all the c2c people this morning about the 12=
-469 and 12-470. I wrote to George, Art, Ian, and Rollye James. Only Rollye=
 James wrote back so far thanking me for the information. That was nice of =
her!- Mike--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "judy_in_hollywood" <Ticket_to_He=
aven@> wrote:>> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-bo=
xes@> wrote:> >> > > > The hack is of the bag, it's out there on the web. O=
nly a friggin' moron would think a few mean words can stop it. I say, tell =
all our friends about the hacks, the Mini box, my boxes, and all ITC commun=
cation methods. I'd be on the radio tonight if I could. > > > > Frank-S> > =
> > > > To: EVP-ITC@: ghostchasingfool@: Sat, 1 Dec 2007 17:28:43 -0800Subj=
ect: Re: [EVP-ITC] ghost box hacks> > > > > > > > > > I am so sorry all of =
you are going through this. Your in our thoughts and prayers! You are all d=
oing positive things and they will prevail!Sumra Dume <duck@> wrote: > > > =
> > > Colleagues,Thank you for your concern. Events that unfolded early thi=
s morning have prompted me to effectively close the Ghostboxhacks site for =
the near term. Do to the nature of these events it is inappropriate to disc=
uss the matter in a public form such as this. Please do not speculate on th=
e nature of this event. I am sorry, after talking to council I removed my s=
tatement from Ghostboxhacks.I don't want to fuel wild speculation. I wish I=
 could go in to greater detail, at this time I have been advised not to.Tha=
nk you, Everyone for your emails and concern.-Sum> > > > The contents of th=
is eletronic correspondence is private & confidential and meant only for th=
e party and/or parties it is addressed to. > > > > No part of this email tr=
ansmission may be publicly posted or forwarded to other parties without exp=
licit written permission.> > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > __________________=
________________________________________> > Connect and share in new ways w=
ith Windows Live.> > http://www.windowslive.com/connect.html?ocid=3DTXT_TAG=
LM_Wave2_newways_112007> >> =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D =3D=
 =3D =3D =3D =3D Hi Frank & All, Well, we ALL could email C2C's George Noor=
ey and tell him about the RS 12-469 Am/FM radio hacks and how to work it . =
. . . IF he mentions it on the show, IMAGINE, the results! Plus, RS would p=
ossibly get sold out of those radios. Kinda like the now discontinued Panas=
onic RR DR-60 IC recorder + potentially increase in value! Why not even pos=
t a Modified RS 12-469 on EBAY and see what happens!? Let's advertise what =
we've discovered, here! =3DJudy=3D> > > > > > > > _________________________=
_________________________________> Your smile counts. The more smiles you s=
hare, the more we donate.  Join in.> www.windowslive.com/smile?ocid=3DTXT_T=
AGLM_Wave2_oprsmilewlhmtagline>
